name: Release v0.16.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for v0.15.0 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/271
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.39.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/273
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.30.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/274
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_bazel_integration_test to v0.12.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/272
* feat: support `dev_dependency` in `generate_module_snippet` by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/276


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/compare/v0.15.0...v0.16.0

## Bazel Module Snippet

```python
bazel_dep(name = "cgrindel_bazel_starlib", version = "0.16.0")
```

## Workspace Snippet

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "cgrindel_bazel_starlib",
    sha256 = "ee0033d029b5eaddc21836b2944cf37c95eb5f214eb39834136a316dbc252a73",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/releases/download/v0.16.0/bazel-starlib.v0.16.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@cgrindel_bazel_starlib//:deps.bzl", "bazel_starlib_dependencies")

bazel_starlib_dependencies()

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")

bazel_skylib_workspace()
```

name: Release v0.15.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for v0.14.9 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/260
* fix(deps): update dependency markdown-link-check to v3.10.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/262

name: Release v0.14.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for v0.13.1 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/229
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/230
* chore: add support for `bzlmod` by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/232
* chore: add CI tests with and without `bzlmod` enabled by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/233
* chore: add `bzlmod_e2e` in preparation for publishing to BCR  by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/234
* chore: refactor CI matrices by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/236
* fix: set `MODULE.bazel` version to 0.0.0 and fix download URL by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/237
* chore: introduce strict bzlmod by adding `WORKSPACE.bzlmod` by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/238


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/compare/v0.13.1...v0.14.0

## Workspace Snippet

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "cgrindel_bazel_starlib",
    sha256 = "7c34796efaadf9b3a5bcf2a8364e5ffc2e2a4a2ef2e0f18c0e876161ba8d21c5",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/releases/download/v0.14.0/bazel-starlib.v0.14.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@cgrindel_bazel_starlib//:deps.bzl", "bazel_starlib_dependencies")

bazel_starlib_dependencies()

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")

bazel_skylib_workspace()
```

name: Release v0.13.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for v0.12.1 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/218
* chore(deps): update bazel_skylib_gazelle_plugin digest to cc47763 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/216
* chore: update to `bazel-skylib` to 1.4.1 by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/219
* chore(deps): update dependency contrib_rules_bazel_integration_test to v0.10.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/220
* chore(deps): update dependency contrib_rules_bazel_integration_test to v0.10.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/221
* chore(deps): update dependency contrib_rules_bazel_integration_test to v0.10.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/222
* feat: add `lists.filter()` and `lists.map()` by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/225
* chore: refactor `lists` module and tests by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/226

name: Release v0.12.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for v0.11.0 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/192
* chore(deps): update dependency com_github_bazelbuild_buildtools to v6 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/193
* chore(deps): update dependency buildifier_prebuilt to v6 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/194
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.29.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/196
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.38.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/197
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.38.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/198
* feat: build and publish release archive by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/201
* Update README.md for v0.11.1-beta by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/204
* Update README.md for v0.11.1-beta by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/205
* chore: point to `gha_create_release@v2` by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/206
* chore(deps): update dependency com_github_bazelbuild_buildtools to v6.0.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/202
* fix: ensure `${repo}` is used in the workspace snippet generation by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/209
* Update README.md for v0.11.1-beta by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/210
* feat: introduce `release_archive` rule by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/211


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/compare/v0.11.0...v0.12.0

name: Release v0.11.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for v0.10.3 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/186
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/187
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v6 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/188
* chore(deps): update dependency contrib_rules_bazel_integration_test to v0.10.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/189
* feat: implement lists.flatten by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/191


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/compare/v0.10.3...v0.11.0

## Workspace Snippet

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "cgrindel_bazel_starlib",
    sha256 = "3f04ca2e3bef99563c6d96728b0a09f8484bc3c61ca804d29f67e86e6043c038",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-starlib-0.11.0",
    urls = [
        "http://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/archive/v0.11.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@cgrindel_bazel_starlib//:deps.bzl", "bazel_starlib_dependencies")

bazel_starlib_dependencies()

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")

bazel_skylib_workspace()
```

name: Release v0.8.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for v0.7.1 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/145
* Configure Renovate by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/146
* feat: point to Renovate preset for org by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/158
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/157
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/151
* chore(deps): update dependency buildifier_prebuilt to v5 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/159
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/148
* chore(deps): update dependency com_github_bazelbuild_buildtools to v5.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/153
* chore(deps): update dependency com_google_protobuf to v3.21.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/154
* chore(deps): update dependency contrib_rules_bazel_integration_test to v0.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/155
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.35.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/156
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_stardoc to v0.5.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/147
* fix: `markdown/tools:update_markdown_toc` by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/162
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.28.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/150
* chore: remove markdown link checking and dependency on rules_nodejs by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/164
* chore: add Skylib `bzl` gazelle plugin by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/165
* feat: support running `execute_binary` in the workspace directory by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/166

## New Contributors
* @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/146

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/compare/v0.7.1...v0.8.0

## Workspace Snippet

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "cgrindel_bazel_starlib",
    sha256 = "3a3b3a5e9b0f63e8a9a193a66bc588c1f2fb2873562be68f2026adb815eea06f",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-starlib-0.8.0",
    urls = [
        "http://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/archive/v0.8.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@cgrindel_bazel_starlib//:deps.bzl", "bazel_starlib_dependencies")

bazel_starlib_dependencies()

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")

bazel_skylib_workspace()
```

name: Release v0.7.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for v0.6.1 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/134
* Upgrade markdown-link-check 3.10.0 by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/137
* Exclude GitHub doc links that now return 403 errors even though they are valid in a browser. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/138
* Upgrade `rules_bazel_integration_test` to 0.6.2. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/139
* Update `bazel_starlib_dependencies` to selectively load dependencies based upon functionality that is used by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/141
* Support Bazel's `----incompatible_disallow_empty_glob` flag by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/142


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/compare/v0.6.1...v0.7.0

name: Release v0.6.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for v0.5.0 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/110
* Added `gha_join_jobs` to ensure all job statuses reflected in `all_ci_tests`. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/111
* Added `//markdown/tools:check_links` to wrap calls to `markdown-link-check` implementing a retry on ECONNRESET error. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/112
* Added `//markdown/tools:update_markdown_doc` and updated `//bzlrelease/tools:update_readme` to use it. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/114
* Implemented `markdown_generate_toc` build rule and tests. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/115
* Implemented `markdown_pkg` to aid in the maintenance of markdown files. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/118
* Updated bzlrelease documentation with info on configuring auto-merge and automatic head branch deletion. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/119
* Upgraded buildifier-prebuilt to 0.3.1 and buildtools to 5.0.1. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/120
* Moved `bzllib` rules to `bzllib/rules`. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/121
* Upgraded keith/buildifier-prebuilt to 0.3.2. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/124
* Added node_repositories declaration with node and yarn versions to address warnings. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/125
* Updated `bzlformat_format` to support fixing lint warnings when possible. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/127
* Added WORKSPACE to the bzlformat_pkg glob. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/128
* Implemented `bzlformat_lint_test` to lint Bazel Starlark files using `buildifier`. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/130
* Reverted `bzllib` to simple structure. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/131


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

## Workspace Snippet

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "cgrindel_bazel_starlib",
    sha256 = "8ac3e45dc237121283d70506497ec39feb5092af9a57bfe34f7abf4a6bd2ebaa",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-starlib-0.6.0",
    urls = [
        "http://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/archive/v0.6.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@cgrindel_bazel_starlib//:deps.bzl", "bazel_starlib_dependencies")

bazel_starlib_dependencies()

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")

bazel_skylib_workspace()
```

name: Release v0.5.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update REAMDE.md for v0.4.1 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/92
* Updated to keith/buildifier-prebuilt 0.2.0. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/94
* Implemented `markdown_check_links_test`. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/98
* Changed call to runfiles `merge_all` to `merge`. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/99
* Added .bazelrc to examples/markdown/simple. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/102
* Add test workflow. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/104
* Add verbose output for link checks and switched a relative  link to absolute to avoid failure when run on MacOS Bazel 4.2.2. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/103
* Removed job_resolution_test.yml and added timeout and flaky to link checks. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/105
* Tag `markdown_check_links_test` as `exclusive` to avoid failure on MacOS CI machines. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/107
* Allow for a custom workspace name in generated workspace snippets. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/109


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/compare/v0.4.1...v0.5.0

## Workspace Snippet

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "cgrindel_bazel_starlib",
    sha256 = "75ede4943a0000661cab0a4495bd10ddfc45bc73df83677eb75f49202ea09a34",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-starlib-0.5.0",
    urls = [
        "http://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/archive/v0.5.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@cgrindel_bazel_starlib//:deps.bzl", "bazel_starlib_dependencies")

bazel_starlib_dependencies()

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")

bazel_skylib_workspace()
```

name: Release v0.4.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Update REAMDE.md for v0.4.0 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/90
* Added more tests to confirm alternate release tags are supported. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/pull/91


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/compare/v0.4.0...v0.4.1

```python
    name = "cgrindel_bazel_starlib",
    sha256 = "57453a08f932633375e630c1553f9e93c1edebe733836d4a6de6fd37c7869680",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-starlib-0.4.1",
    urls = [
        "http://github.com/cgrindel/bazel-starlib/archive/v0.4.1.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@cgrindel_bazel_starlib//:deps.bzl", "bazel_starlib_dependencies")

bazel_starlib_dependencies()

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")

bazel_skylib_workspace()
```
